### Aircraft Deicing-defrosting Fluid Tender Notice

#### Solicitation Details

*   **Solicitation Number**: W8486-249161/A
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RF.SO)
*   **Pursuant to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)**

#### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking a National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for the supply of Aircraft De-icing-defrosting Fluid (NSN 6850-20-004-0272, NSN 6850-20-004-2341, NSN 6805-20-A0B-8875 or equivalent) for various Canadian Forces Bases across Canada on an as-and-when-ordered basis. The offeror shall provide the required de-icing solution for a period of up to four (4) years, with an initial term of one (1) year and the option to extend for an additional three (3) one-year periods.

#### Delivery and Payment Terms

*   **Places of Delivery**: Alberta, British Columbia, Nova Scotia, and Quebec (except National Capital Region)
*   **Rate of Payment**: Payable according to the terms and conditions outlined in the tender documents

#### Instructions to Tenderers

*   **Language**: Tender documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French)
*   **Delivery**: Tender documents must be delivered electronically through the Canada Buys website
*   **Closing Date**: 2023-08-09T14:00:00
*   **Request for Clarification**: Any requests for clarification must be submitted in writing, and the contractor will respond within two (2) business days

#### Evaluation Criteria

*   **Price**: The evaluation will be based on the lowest price

#### Attachments and Reference Materials

*   The tender documents are available on the Canada Buys website (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7105/w8486-249161_rfso_en.pdf)

#### Contact Information

*   **Name**: Julianne Eng
*   **Email**: julianne.eng@forces.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: (343) 572-5275
